title: FS: Which O’Hara St Louis will you let me keep? SOLD!!!
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS: Which O’Hara St Louis will you let me keep? SOLD!!!
posts.post_content:
I have 2. I only need 1.  You pick. ;)

Asking $SOLD via paypal or money order. Will listen to offers!  But anyone saying they will take it will get priority over ongoing negotiations.

Only selling 1 of these.....
